job.title: AWS DevOps Engineer
job.description:
Title: Azure/AWS DevOps Engineer

Location: 100% Remote

Type: Direct-hire


Job Description: Global company has an urgent need for a junior to mid-level AWS DevOps Engineer. The position will be the right-hand to the VP of Architecture and DevOps and has growth potential as they grow their DevOps environment. Candidate must be willing to move to AWS in 6 months as they acquired a competitor who is an Azure/AWS shop and they do not have this expertise. Seeking a candidate that is focused on organizational issues, social aspects, understanding how things are done, ability to communicate, and passion for teaching, not just technical. Charisma is welcomed.


Required Skills:

- AWS

- CICD

- Docker

- Observability (metrics and alerting)
